column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////This place deserves 5 stars because of the amazing service I received this past weekend
column2: particularly by a waiter named Henry. It was my first time here and I realized that it was more of a loungey vibe
column3: with a DJ and people bustling around the bar just hanging out. So with our party of over 10 people and with it being so loud and busy
column4: I was pleasantly surprised to have had such great service! Our waiter was attentive
column5: timely and overall very nice. The food was also awesome! Will definitely be back to try their brunch :)
